Uses of Class
Character.Character

  • Packages that use Character 
    Package Description
    Character  
    GameManager  

    • Uses of Character in Character

      Methods in Character with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Character.takeDamage(int damage, Character attacker)
      lowers the characters health, and detects whether they are dead or not.

    • Uses of Character in GameManager

      Methods in GameManager with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void GameManager.play(Character m)
      Starts the game.
      static void GameManager.setPlayer(Character character)
      Sets the player to be a new player, this will be called if the player doesn't go into NG+ with the same character.
